public class ValueFunctorChannelAdaptorClass
extends ObservableDelegeeAbsClass
implements ValueModel
A ValueFunctorSubjectAdaptorClass is a simple implementation of a ValueModel that uses setters/getters to treat a subject object as a storage for a value.
